doc:
Victor Aaron https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Victor_Aaron 0 Victor Aaron Ramirez (September 11, 1956 – September 4, 1996) was a Native American actor of the Yaqui tribe. He was the original voice of John Redcorn on King of the Hill, which was taken over by Jonathan Joss in the show's second season following Aaron's death. He died in a road accident in 1996, 7 days before his 40th birthday. The King of the Hill episode "The Order of the Straight Arrow" is dedicated to his memory. Victor_Aaron_Ramirez ( September_11_,_1956 – September_4_,_1996 ) was a_Native_American_actor of the_Yaqui_tribe . He was the_original_voice of John_Redcorn on King of the_Hill , which was_taken over by Jonathan_Joss in the_show 's_second_season following Aaron 's_death . He died in a_road_accident in 1996 , 7_days before his_40th_birthday . The_King of the_Hill_episode " The_Order of the_Straight_Arrow " is_dedicated to his_memory .
